title: S12 Ep136: The Robotic Greys: Humanities Tipping Point
itunes:title: The Robotic Greys: Humanities Tipping Point
description:
Nigel Kerner returns to discuss disturbing Alien Abduction scenarios and exposes the agenda behind the bio-robotic grey aliens' genetic manipulation of certain human races. Nigel shares his thoughts on what can we expect in our future and addresses the question, "Are we at a tipping point that could cause the ruin of humanity?"

www.NigelKerner.com
